library(readxl)
library(dplyr)


data4block.df= read.csv("D:\\test\\英業達\\2356.csv", sep=",", row.names=1)
names(data4block.df)

sol<-''

if(TureORFalse1!=TureORFalse2)
{
  if(TureORFalse1==1)
  {

    print(d)
    print(rsi)
    print(sol)

    endlist<-c(endlist,end)
    smalist<-c(smalist,sma60)

}
else
{

}


i<-i+1
}

Total<-cbind(datelist,klist,dlist,rsilist,sollist,endlist,smalist)
